message: Metro Design for desktop is Crap!
caption: Attachment UnavailableThis attachment may have been removed or the person who shared it may not have permission to share it with you.

data.message: The one thing I like most about the article is how its perspective doesn't suggest what you say in your commentary. But, nevermind anyway.
from the day one, i criticized the forced migration of desktop windows to the touch-friendly metro. apple didn't unify its ecosystem entirely by the way. i hate ms design team and their strategy

I have to agree with Ahmed Adel... Metro is designed as a mobile touchscreen UI... MS are retarded for imposing that UX on thier desktop users... first thing i did on Win8.1 was install a startmenu and practically remove metro out of the way.
I like the Office 2007 analogy in the article, but you know, as usual, nevermind.
